decimate your opponents with a spray of bullets

im in the minority with this harsh opinion but reviews should be honest so here it is these dlcs do not increase your playtime even modders create better stuff for free this probably took five minutes to create i dont like these types of additional stuff this really doesnt need to be in the store you can buy it to support the developers and sure thats a really nice thing to do but they couldve made better dlcs too i honestly cant give it a positive review

the outfit looks really slick and you only need to wear 1 part of the outfit to get its effects the improvements to guns are really worthwhile double ammo makes sniper rifles  lmgs much last longer and it makes shotguns actually worth picking up
a good pickup for those who felt that the guns were a bit lacking this costume buffs all gun damage and adds extra ammo for any pickup  this dlc is worth picking up at full price
that will come in handy for firearms ingame
